import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; import pixelmartHeroImage from './pixelmartHero.png'; // Import the image const App = () => { const [scrollY, setScrollY] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => setScrollY(window.scrollY); window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); const sloganOpacity = Math.max(1 - scrollY / 500, 0); // Slogan fades out with scroll const imageOpacity = Math.min(0.5 + scrollY / 1000, 1); // Image becomes more visible with scroll return (
